snippet.title: Tom the postgirl - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
"Tom the postgirl" is a 2D singleplayer narrative adventure currently being developed in Zürich (CH) by the Oopsie Daisies Studio.

SYNOPSIS
Follow Tom the postgirl on her daily duty to deliver packages, which always takes a wrong turn. Most of it comes down to Tom being a creep, peeking inside homes whenever she gets the occasion and messing with the content of the packages.
Explore the consequences of voyeurism in a hand-drawn environment, where dark humour and intense weirdness create a unique multilinear tale.
